timeline.message:
CB-8629 [ASRG] single RG and custom network: single RG is deleted when network is deleted

On azure when deleting a network created by cloudbreak the resource group of the network is deleted. In case of single RG the network and deployment resources themselves should be deleted instead of the resource group.

timeline.bodyText: This is the third occurrence of this fragment in this class, let alone the others, could you pls extract this logic?
